title: sharaNam sharaNam
sahitya:
sharaNam sharaNam un tALiNai sharaNam sakala uyirgaLukkum tanipperum tAyE


anupallavi

  taruNam adil varum taNmazhai pOlavE aruLiDum annaiyAm Ananda mEghamE


caraNam    pirai aNi puNNiyan ponnoLir mEniyil polittiDum kAr nilap-pudu malark-koDiyE 
viraivinil unnaruL nOkkuDan pAr enrE tiruvaDi tanjamAi aDaindanan nAn inru
